name: Blooey's Path
description:
Hello! You are Blooey. You will begin with nothing and you will build your path.
Each day you continue gaining new knowledge and creativity.
Can you reach your destination? Let's find out.

This game was made in 7 days for the Kindred Community Jam #6
https://itch.io/jam/kindred-community-jam-6 with the theme 'At the Beginning, there was Nothing'

All the code and art was made during the 7 day period aside from a few scripts and code snippets.

All of the sound design has been made using household items and soft synths during this period. All of the music has been composed for the jam during this period as well. 

Credits:
RCJ15 - Programming and Art
R41ndrop12 - Art
Musehive - Sound Design
Arin Eakins - Music Composer
